************
Integrations
************

The system is integrated with: 

- Tawk.to: `To enable users quick access to support`.
- Google Analytics: `To link the site with Google Analytics and monitor how well you are fairing`.
- Facebook: `For Facebook Graph integration`. 
- Paystack: `To help the system acquire real name and verify account number of the user`. 
- Sitemaps: `With a simple single button click you can generate sitemaps and ping all major search engines to crawl your site`.
